languages.text: "Я тоже так думаю. Берите тогда мою удачу и выбирайтесь отсюда".
"I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."
languages.original_text: "Я тоже так думаю. Берите тогда мою удачу и выбирайтесь отсюда".

traits.locale_text: "I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."
"I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."
"I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."
"I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."
"I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."
"I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."

languages.text: "Das stimmt In diesem Fall kommt mein Glück auch Euch zugute, damit Ihr von hier entkommen könnt."
languages.original_text: "I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."

traits.locale_text: "Das stimmt In diesem Fall kommt mein Glück auch Euch zugute, damit Ihr von hier entkommen könnt."

languages.text: « C'est juste. Dans ce cas, ajoutez donc ma chance à la vôtre afin de réussir à filer d'ici. »
languages.original_text: "I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."

traits.locale_text: « C'est juste. Dans ce cas, ajoutez donc ma chance à la vôtre afin de réussir à filer d'ici. »

languages.text: «Opino lo mismo. En tal caso, puede usted sumar mi suerte a la suya para salir de aquí».
languages.original_text: "I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."

traits.locale_text: «Opino lo mismo. En tal caso, puede usted sumar mi suerte a la suya para salir de aquí».

languages.text: “我同意。既然如此，我可以把我的好运分给你，这样你就能活着离开这里了。”
languages.original_text: "I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."

traits.locale_text: “我同意。既然如此，我可以把我的好运分给你，这样你就能活着离开这里了。”

languages.text: 「同感です。ならば、あなたの幸運に私の運も添えましょう――ここから無事に脱出できるように」
languages.original_text: "I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."

traits.locale_text: 「同感です。ならば、あなたの幸運に私の運も添えましょう――ここから無事に脱出できるように」

languages.text: "Katılıyorum. O hâlde benim şansım da sizin olsun ki buradan çıkabilin."
languages.original_text: "I agree. In that case, you may add my luck to your own so you can get out of here."

traits.locale_text: "Katılıyorum. O hâlde benim şansım da sizin olsun ki buradan çıkabilin."
